Company Description by the company:
Here at Unidex Inc, we work hard to distinguish ourselves from our competitors. We want our clients to have confidence that they have made the right decision in choosing to work with us. We'll be happy to handle all of your industrial equipment needs. Here's what sets us apart from other suppliers in this industry.

Customizable Products

We offer a wide range of industrial lifts and manipulators for you to choose from. In most cases, you'll be able to find exactly what you are looking for in our product lineup. If you need equipment for specialized uses, we will gladly make any modifications needed to our existing equipment to accommodate your needs. We can even create custom machinery that is exactly suited to your business.

Quality and Durability

Each and every product we design gets the same attention to detail from start to finish. We take care to choose only materials that are of the highest quality. You expect your lifts and manipulators to work as hard as you do, and our products More... do exactly that. All of our products go through rigorous testing to ensure they can withstand the rigors of a busy industrial facility to have the longest life possible.

 Intuitive and Easy to Use

 We design all of our products with the end-user in mind, meaning the workers at your facility. Many of our products are the result of ongoing collaboration with those who actually use our products in the field, giving us the chance to make the necessary modifications to make our equipment as easy as possible to use. In fact, our manipulators can lift, move and rotate heavy items in more than 100 different ways!

 Available Worldwide

 Here at Unidex Inc, we recognize that not all of our customers have easy access to industrial lifts and manipulators in their local areas, which is why we are proud to ship our products all over the world. It doesn't matter if your facility is in a major metropolitan area or somewhere more rural. We'll deliver your products right to your door so you can put them to work right away.

 We would love to tell you more about our lifts and manipulators and how they can help your business. Our associates will take the time to get to know your needs and answer all of your questions before making a recommendation as to the best equipment for you. Get in touch with us today to get started! Less

Company Description by the company:
Your go-to supplier.

Green Rubber-Kennedy AG supplies key products and services to industries including farming, food processing, baking, manufacturing, mining, shipping and more. We carry pumps, motors, valves and accessories, safety equipment, hoses and fittings, custom conveyor belting, urethane parts, and much much more.

The company was founded over 30 years ago in the heart of California's Salinas Valley, the nation's salad bowl. Over the years we have grown to five locations throughout California and Arizona. Each location includes walk-in sales, equipment repair and fabrication. However, we also ship products to customers around the USA. When you can't come to the store to shop, we'll deliver to you. When you need belting repairs or fabrication on-site, we'll send a team to your facility.

We're real people with real experience providing solutions to your production needs. Because we are a multi-generational family business we are in it for the long haul. Our expert staff treats every More... customer like one of the family, and we are dedicated to building long-term working relationships. We take pride in delivering products and services on time, as promised. So, when you need pumps, motors, valves and accessories, safety equipment, hoses and fittings, custom conveyor belting, and urethane parts you can count on Green Rubber-Kennedy AG.

 Keeping the supply chain moving.

 We are proud distributors of a wide range of products from over 500 top manufacturers such as 3M, Dixon, Honda Power Equipment, Banjo, Van Der Graaf, Flexco, Spears, Parker-Dayco-Eastman, Gates-TPU, Bandit, Value-Guide, Sterling Electric, AC Tech, and more.

 - Conveyor belting and drive motors.

 - Custom urethane parts.

 - Water tanks, trailers and sprayers.

 - Pressure washers and accessories.

 - Pumps, valves and fittings.

 - Safety and personal protection.

 - And much, much more. Less

Company Description by the company:
Columbus McKinnon is a leading worldwide designer, manufacturer, and marketer of material handling systems and services, which efficiently and ergonomically move, lift, position, or secure material. Key products include hoists, actuators, cranes, and lifting and rigging tools. With a rich 135-year tradition, the company is focused on commercial and industrial applications that require the safety and quality provided by its superior design and know-how. 

Columbus McKinnon Corporation is made up of many well-known brands around the world, like CM Hoists, CM Rigging, Yale Hoists, Budgit Hoists, Chester Hoists, Coffing/Little Mule, Shaw-Box, CM-et, Duff-Norton, Abell-Howe, Gaffey, Cady Lifters, Loderail, CM Tire Recycling, WECO, Alltec, Pfaff Silberblau, and more.

CM has more than a century of experience providing products and solutions for industrial manufacturing and construction, and the CM brand has developed a loyal following with users around the globe. Products such as the Lodestar electric More... chain hoist and the orange pin shackles are requested by name due to their reputation for durability and long life. Products are available for individual purpose, but due to the expansive line of products that provides complete solutions for overhead lifting applications, items are also easily combined to offer comprehensive systems to satisfy the exact requirements of users. From heavy-duty hoists for environments such as steel production to general duty chain and hooks for commercial use, the CM name represents a legacy of expertise in the market.

 Yale represents one of the most popular brands in the material handling industry, with users specifying it for applications ranging from offshore oil platforms to pulp and paper production. Known for a wide range of wire rope products, the Yale brand stands for top quality and performance. Primarily supplied through crane builders as part of complete overhead lifting systems, Yale products are used in hundreds of industries around the globe.

 Chester Hoists specializes in matching the exact product to satisfy specific job needs.

 From low headroom manual hoists for military applications to spark-resistant hoist/trolley combinations for use on offshore oil platforms, Chester Hoist has the expertise to design products to get the job done. The company specializes in engineered products for special requirements such as those for use in hazardous areas, corrosive environments, clean rooms, and other demanding applications. Less

 Technical Knowledge. PLCHardware.com has brought together a talented multilingual team of professionals with decades of experience in high-tech distribution, supply chain management, logistics, industrial automation, network technologies, and customer care.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of automated or manually operated welding systems including micro tungsten inert gas (TIG), resistance, battery tab, laser and ultrasonic. Alternating current (AC), direct current (DC), capacitor discharge (CD) and single or dual pulse micro resistance spot welders are available. Induction systems, shrink wrap, electrodes, heads, nickel strips or tabs and brushes are offered. Sealing, engraving and soldering machinery are also provided. Weld monitors, inverter power supplies and some heads or welders are distributed. Serves electronics, aerospace, automotive, dental, medical, semiconductor, defense and military industries.
Company Description by the company:
Sunstone Engineering LLC designs and manufactures high-tech micro welding and engraving solutions for many different industries. In short, wherever a very small spot weld is needed in a very precise location, you'll find a Sunstone welder. 

Jewelers, power cell manufacturers, aerospace companies, automotive groups, orthodontists, dental labs, and electronics manufacturers need a Sunstone welder to assist them in the manufacturing process. Sunstone welders are used by Apple, NASA, MIT, GE, HP, SpaceX, Lockheed Martin, Boeing, Harley-Davidson, and multiple government and military agencies. 

The Sunstone product line includes laser, pulse arc, capacitive discharge, AC, linear DC, HF inverter, and hot bar reflow welding systems. The bulk of our products are designed and manufactured in Utah while other products are manufactured via key partner relationships. The company sells and ships welders to all parts of the world.

Sunstone sells its products primarily through industrial trade shows and More... events around the world. Sunstone customers, and its unique group of authorized dealers, can be found worldwide. The Sunstone executive management team is loaded with micro welding experience and knowledge, with most having joined the company in its startup mode. Now in a significant growth stage, Sunstone has complimented its team with experienced sales, marketing, and engineering professionals. Less

Company Description by the company:
Industrial Repair Service has been servicing manufacturing plants across the nation since 1991. 

We've learned a lot about what it means to be efficient, detail-oriented, reliable and punctual for our hard-working customers. 

At Industrial Repair Service we understand that our customers have unique repair needs.That's why we created our innovative warranties - to fit your needs! 

Your warranty isn't activated until your parts are installed into your machine. You will never have to worry about your warranty expiring while your spare units wait on the shelf. 

Did we mention we also cover your whole unit? Not just the parts we repaired? Yep, that's part of the deal, too!

Company Description by the company:
Since our founding in Japan in 1885, Oriental Motor globally has been providing the optimal motion systems as part of our total service, to meet the widest market demands. We manufacture and sell AC motors, stepper and servo motors, linear and rotary actuators, network solutions, accessories and thermal management solutions. Oriental Motor's sales and service network is international, with offices throughout North America, Europe and Asia.

Our focus is to communicate with our customers from the stage where they start studying their equipment through the delivery and after sales service. This is characterized by "Before Sales and After Sales" support. Over 20,000 of our catalog products are available to ship same day or up to 7 business days (for orders placed before 12:00 PM PST). To support our commitment to total service, our 800 Technical Support is available from 8:30 AM EST to 5:00 PM PST. We offer many additional online services including our motor sizing and selection tool, our on-demand More... video library, application training and on sight support.

 Leading industries we service include medical, food & packaging, semiconductor, emerging markets and established Factory Automation (FA) applications. With R&D on a global scale, Oriental Motor gains different perspectives into market expansion and customer requirements, resulting in the development of state-of-the-art technology to meet a wide range of needs. Our continuous research and development programs and tradition of quality guarantee that we meet the most rigorous specifications and deliver the highest standards of construction, ease of use and unequaled performance. Company Description by the company:

We hire and train technical sales engineers to provide our customers with plant floor application support. The ifm efector inventory management network consists of our manufacturing facility and three regional warehouses. Furthermore, stock is also available from local warehouses throughout North America. Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer & distributor of conveyor systems, parts & supports, bearings, ball transfers, cargo handling hardware, fence & gate hardware, OEM components, industrial hardware & material handling products. Conveyors such as overhead conveyors, enclosed track conveyors, I-beam conveyors, light duty conveyors & flexible conveyors are available. Types of bearings include ball bearings, permanently lubricated bearings, flanged bearings, radial bearings & hex bore bearings. Conveyor components & accessories such as tracks, conveyor chains, drive units & drive parts, inverter controls, lubricators, horizontal curves, vertical curves, carriers, support brackets, joint brackets, track welding fixtures, inspection sections, carrier insert sections, anti-backup safety stops, expansion sleeves, trolleys, driving lugs, J-hook pusher dog pendants & pusher arms are available. Prototyping & long run production services available.
Company Description by the company:
Our Products and Services have developed and evolved fueled by our desire to meet the needs of our Customers. Now as we are in the midst of our second decade, our products and services fall into the following general categories:

Overhead Conveyor Components and Systems:

1stSource offers quality components for all of the following (8) sub-types of OHC as well as the design/build and systems integration ability for expansions of existing systems and new systems.The first of the two basic types of OHC are known as Enclosed Track Conveyor (ETC). We offer both Round Tube Enclosed Track Conveyors and Square Track Enclosed Track Conveyors. For X Type drop forged Overhead Conveyor (OHC) Chain and components, 1stSource offers competitive pricing for the three types of X Type OHC: X348, X458 and X678

Bearings and Ball Transfers:

1stSource holds inventory of over 150 SKUs of the most commonly used bearings and ball transfers in the conveyor industry for same or next day shipment. In addition we offer More... volume pricing to our OEM Customers based on annual blanket order agreements. We have the ability to design and develop almost any type of bearing and ball transfer required if our Customers have adequate usages to justify development costs and inventory.

 Fence & Gate Hardware:

 1stSource entered the Fence Industry because we were asked to develop a series of Cantilever Gate rollers for a national Fence Hardware Distribution Customer. These components are wheels each with bearings and they were similar to the Conveyor components familiar to us. After supplying these Gate Rollers for several years, our Customer turned over marketing to 1stSource and we entered the Fence market ourselves. We also provide steel hinges and attachments for wood and vinyl fencing, glass-fiber reinforced hinges and latches and a line of glass-filled reinforced hinges.

 Hinges and Industrial Hardware components:

 1stSource holds continual inventory of many steel butt hinges for annual blanket order supply to our OEM Customers. 

 OEM Component development and long term supply:

 Typically, our Customers request that we provide proposals for the development of different types of proprietary components and assemblies. We submit our offers with schedules for design, tooling and develop of prototype samples for Customer inspection, testing and approval. At times prototype samples require modifications, but once samples are approved by Customers we then proceed to https://tnetcc.thomasnet.com/ccnew/mission.html?soannual blanket order agreements, whereby we supply the products just in time from our US warehouse or via direct volume shipments to the Customers facility.

 What type of OEM products can 1stSource develop and supply? Just ask us and we will tell you if we are capable of developing a product or not, but in general we excel at bearing related products, stamped steel assemblies, castings, forgings etc. Less

Knowing that there is no one solution that fits all, we strive to provide our customers with innovative and reliable manufacturing technology solutions so that we may be their single source provider.

Company Description by the company:
Experience

Since 1977, Scott Equipment has been dedicated to the distribution of high quality, technically advanced and energy efficient products for the industrial market. We have over 300 years of machine automation experience employed today.

Customer service is not just a department.

Our entire organization is aligned around one mission, to provide the best customer service possible.

We work with more than a part number.

We work to assist you in specifying the best component, assembly or kit for your application. If a standard product doesn't exist to meet your needs, we will work to develop a custom solution to meet your specific application.

Flexibility

As we strive to offer the best customer service possible, our flexibility can be one of our greatest assets. Need something special, something different, special labels or want to order by your part number? Ask us, and we will do our best to accommodate your request.

Industrial Power Transmission & Material Handling Equipment

Company Description by Thomasnet: Manufacturer of power inverters and green energy products for off-grid and renewable energy applications. Products include modified sine inverters, pure sine inverters, pure sine inverter chargers, grid tie solar inverters, European inverters, UL® listed power inverters and rack mount inverters. Inverter cables, fuse kits, solar panels, ground mount racks, silent generators, solar charge controllers and DC-DC step down converters are available. Company Description by the company:
AIMS Power mission statement: Lead the inverter industry in design and development to provide the highest quality products possible in the world of off-grid and renewable energy, and back that up with the best customer service and tech support in the business.

Overview: AIMS Power is a complete provider of DC to AC inverters, chargers, solar panels, deep-cycle batteries, transfer switches, and related green energy products in the United States and throughout the world.

The AIMS product offering begins at 75 watts and covers the spectrum up to 7000 watt of continuous output power. We offer 12vdc and 24vdc inputs and 120, 220, 240vac outputs. Our customers rely on our extensive inventory of the most popular and cost effective modified sine wave inverters, pure sine wave inverters and digital pure sine wave inverters. Our Industrial Grade product line features Pulse Width Modulation for more stabilization of frequency and voltage level to help run equipment more efficiently.

Company Description by the company:
HBR Industries is a Veteran Owned Small Business that was founded in the heart of the Silicon Valley in 1979 as a custom transformer manufacturer. In the years since, our company has evolved to meet the changing needs of our customers, becoming one of the leading tube bending companies and coil winding specialists in the valley. One thing that has not changed is our practice of putting the customer first. We firmly believe that it is a privilege to work for our customers, and we work hard to honor that privilege.

Our founder learned the ins and outs of electronics manufacturing by serving in the US Air Force and while working for other California based companies throughout the 1960's. When the time came to strike out on his own, he put all his expertise-along with a good deal of time and perseverance - into HBR Industries. The company he built still bears his initials (HBR).

HBR Industries encourages our clients to think differently. There are almost no limits to our manufacturing capabilities, More... and we welcome the challenge of working with even the most complex designs from all the major industries.

 Promise to our clients:

 We have dedicated our mission to turning customer designs into tangible products. We promise to always have our goal to help you and your company succeed and grow by utilizing the prototype that we help manufacture.

 We pride ourselves on the ability to meet the tightest dead lines without ever compromising the quality of our product and service (including procuring materials for clients). Less

Company Description by the company:
Since our beginnings in Tucson, Arizona in 1968, IOTA has worked continuously in the electronic.

R & D field, designing and manufacturing innovative products for the lighting industry. The IOTA DC ballast design gained national recognition when it was selected in a national competition by NASA for use aboard SKYLAB. The system performed flawlessly through all missions.

Today, IOTA is a pioneer and leader in the lighting industry, designing and manufacturing state-of-the-art emergency lighting equipment for commercial, national, international, and institutional applications. Additionally, IOTA's product line has expanded to include AC/DC power conversion and battery charging equipment used in vehicular, recreational, solar, industrial, and telecommunication markets.

Company Description by the company:
Analytic Systems Ware Ltd. was founded in 1976 by Lloyd Hargrove, P.Eng. As the former chief civilian engineer for the underwater acoustics division of the Canadian Navy, Lloyd wanted his company to have the Anti-Submarine Warfare acronym ASW and coined the name Analytic Systems Ware. In 1993, he passed control of the company to his son James Hargrove, P.Eng. The company was the first to develop high frequency switching voltage converters for the Marine industry in 1976, and offered Pure Sinewave Inverters in 1994, years ahead of the competition. 

In 2015, almost 40 years since it was founded, Analytic Systems has grown into a multi-faceted Power Electronics company serving the Industrial marketplace with a wide range of robust and highly reliable Power Supplies, Voltage Converters, Inverters, Battery Chargers, Frequency Converters and MPPT Charge Controllers. The company also proudly serves the Military and OEM marketplace with innovative designs to meet specific requirements. The company's More... 'Build in North America' philosophy, combined with its AS9100 aerospace quality certification and Controlled Goods Directorate security certification ensure your needs and requirements will be met and that your precious Intellectual Property is secure in our hands. Company Description by the company:
Dynapower is the leading independent supplier of custom and standard power conversion solutions for the metal finishing, mining, chemical production, metals manufacturing, and energy storage industries. Founded in 1963 in Detroit, Michigan, today Dynapower from its 150,000 square ft. vertically integrated engineering and manufacturing facility in South Burlington, Vermont designs and manufactures custom and standard power conversion equipment for applications worldwide. Dynapower acquired Rapid Power Technologies and manufactures and services its full line of rectifiers.

Customers include Apple, Dow Chemical, GE, Tesla, Freeport McMahon, Boeing, Cadillac, Harley-Davidson, Duke Energy, NextEra, and the United States Navy among hundreds of others. Our equipment has been deployed on all continents and is serviced by a team of factory-trained and employed technicians that can be deployed at a moment's notice. In addition to housing extensive research and development facilities, Dynapower maintains More... an industry leading test facility that is capable of simulating the grid and every manner of industry application. Dynapower prides itself on providing the right solution for its clients' power conversion challenges. No matter the size of the job or client, Dynapower is here to help 24/7. Less

Company Description by the company:
Advanced Test Equipment Rentals (ATEC) is a leading high tech equipment rental company that provides complete general and special purpose electronic, electrical, and environmental test equipment solutions for analysis, inspection, measurement, monitoring, simulation, powering, certifying and commissioning of products and electrical infrastructure. ATEC is one of the largest rental companies nationwide of test equipment for telecommunications, aerospace, semiconductor, consumer electronics and many other sectors. 

ATEC provides test equipment to companies looking to manage their test equipment budget and maximize the companys growth. For more than 30 years, companies have rented from ATEC to preserve capital, adjust for seasonal demand, increase utilization of existing test equipment, and take on more jobs without increasing capital expenses. Company Description by the company: We originally founded Cherrys in 1982 to market the pallet inverter, a new product developed to turn entire pallet loads over to safely recover and replace damaged loads. However, it was not enough to have one great product; we wanted to create lasting solutions to the problems of the pallet industry like, repetitive motion injuries, back strain, fatigue, and other incidents resulting in harm to employees, expensive workmens compensation claims, and lost hours. Therefore, we expanded our product line, with each custom machine geared toward reducing risk and saving valuable time. We made the decision to bring everything back home years ago, realizing the importance of upholding the highest standard of quality, and not contributing to unsafe environmental practices. Our innovative, top-notch risk assessment examines the potential outcomes of each product and subsequently constructs a lasting piece of machinery that aims to reduce risk and improve your productivity. We respect our clients. More... We understand what matters to you. Moreover, these values inform all we do. That is our promise to you. Less

Company Description by the company:
FlexLink is one of the worlds leading conveyor manufacturers, offering flexible, modular conveyors, industrial automation and assembly equipment. FlexLink specializes in automated plastic chain conveyor systems, including aluminum conveyors and stainless steel conveyors.

FlexLink manufactures and designs modular industrial automation systems such as flexible conveyors, modular conveyors, and automated assembly systems, including design and engineering of assembly automation systems. Flexible conveyors from FlexLink are automated conveyors based on an aluminum (or stainless steel) conveyor beam with low friction slide rails guiding a plastic flexible conveyor chain. Automated or robotic assembly systems for lightweight products cover a wide range of applications, from simple pallet-based systems through to highly-automated turnkey assembly systems and test systems. Pallet conveyor systems and modular pallet conveyor equipment utilizes assembly pallets on flexible plastic chain pallet conveyors More... to maximize product flow. 

 FlexLink offers solutions for automotive, electronics, food and dairy, laboratory automation, medical, pharmaceuticals, compliant logistics, paper converting, personal products, solar, tissue, massflow and tobacco manufacturing applications.

 FlexLink provides the following products: plastic chain conveyors, aluminum conveyors, stainless steel conveyors, flexible conveyors, modular conveyors, automated conveyor systems, automated assembly systems, automation cells, material handling conveyors, linear drives, linear motion systems, modular conveyors, pallet conveyors and table top conveyors. Handling solutions include accumulators, automated storage and retrieval systems (ASRS), alpine conveyors, diverters, merge units, spacer units, gravity chutes, incline conveyors, spiral elevators, wedge conveyors, robotic palletizers, pick and place units, roller bridges, pushers and wipe-off units. Company Description by the company:
Carlson - Dimond & Wright, Inc. is more than just a distributor!

There comes a time when merely getting a product off the shelf and at the lowest price is just not enough. Today's highly technical manufacturing processes require product knowledge, applications engineering, and field service. Our customers understand that the key to their success is in selecting the supplier who can provide the value added component to the goods and services equation. At Carlson - Dimond & Wright, Inc. we know our products, and take pride in being able to assist our customers in selecting the product that will best serve their application, now and in the future. All of our efforts are directed toward seeing that our customers get the right product, at the right time, and that it is fully supported after the sale.

Beginning in 1956 as consulting engineers for the automotive industry, Carlson - Dimond & Wright, Inc.s first contract was for the design of body storage lines for the Chevrolet Plant at Janesville, More... Wisconsin. From this we grew to be a pre-eminent power transmission distributor in eastern Michigan. Our ability to service our product line after the sale is unsurpassed in our market. We are capable of repairing all of our mechanical products on. Carlson - Dimond & Wright, Inc.s service department provides field start-up assistance with our own staff. We offer complete maintenance in our facility or assistance at the customers plant. Our assemblers do modifications to standard products quickly and efficiently. Carlson - Dimond & Wright, Inc. is not just a distributor, we are a totally integrated supplier to the automotive, chemical, steel, food and associated industries in Michigan.

 From Basic Commodity-Type to the Latest Microprocessor-Based Drives. Our product lines are selected, not because of price or profit margin, but on how well they perform. We look for manufactures that not only build quality, but also back it up with service. Carlson - Dimond & Wright, Inc. does everything it can do to provide a totally integrated, problem solving product line. Quality conscious people know that quality survives long after price is forgotten. We provide the product when you need it, no matter how difficult that may be. We expend every effort to see that you receive it when promised.

 What sets us apart is our endless attention to details. We take special care to insure that the product is being used properly. Customer satisfaction begins with a commitment to our sense of quality, our future and yours. If our customer has a failure, we don't just fill the order for another one, we research the situation to see how we can correct the problem. This attention to detail applies to the simplest coupling or bearing, as well as to the more sophisticated, highly technical drives. We are always looking for new and better ways to solve your manufacturing problems. We care about what we do and how we do it! Less

Company Description by the company:
Backwoods Solar is a company specifically dedicated to serving homes, villages and communities so remote that access to utility lines is not practical. For almost 40 years, we have specialized in independent electric power for the remote off-grid or grid-tied home. We have nine solar electric specialists offering personalized attention to self-reliant home owners who choose and install their own power systems, as well as larger installers doing off-grid battery based and grid-connected solar around the world. 

In the last five years we have expanded our focus to offer remote power for telecom systems, water pumping, clinics and rural villages internationally. What makes us unique is that our technicians live in homes that get their power from the wind, water or sun using the products we sell in our catalog. Our team personally answers all letters, email, and call during business hours, to help with your questions and equipment needs. Your questions will get answered and your needs will More... be met. It is our earnest goal to leave you completely satisfied. 

 Backwoods Solar has been designing off-grid solar, wind, and micro-hydro systems that work without the grid since 1978. Since grid-tie solar systems have become more prevalent, we have used our battery expertise to help design systems that incorporate both the features of utility net metering, with the convenience of battery back-up when outages happen. Back-up power systems do not even have to incorporate solar, since power outages occur most often during times of inclement weather. Many of the standby inverter and battery systems that we design can automatically support a few selected emergency needs during short utility outages. When the utility fails, the system can instantly deliver power to a computer, cash register, pellet stove, or lights for frequent and sometimes longer utility outages. Batteries are kept at fully charged by utility power until an outage, at which time the inverter automatically takes over the selected emergency needs. Additionally, a quiet, durable propane fueled generator set with manual or automatic transfer switch can power the whole house during hours, days, or even weeks of power outage emergency.

 Our experience has taught us that customized systems are better. Power is too important to leave it to a one-size-fits-all product or pre-packaged kit.Let us design a customized system for you. We offer free system design and we'll be there after the sale, too, for the life of the system! Less

Peak Beam Systems, Inc. is a leader in the design and manufacture of high-intensity illumination devices for military and security applications. Peak Beams flagship product, the Maxa Beam Searchlight, has been tested and fielded by U.S. military and federal agencies for over twenty-four years and continues to be the most powerful handheld searchlight available in the world.
 

The Maxa Beam Searchlight has several characteristics that set it apart from the competition, including an unparalleled 12,000,000 CandlePower output, motorized beam width adjustment, state-of-the-art rechargeable batteries, and a variety of infrared and beam shape filtering options. The Maxa Beam also features a strobe function that is used as a non-lethal weapon by military, law enforcement, and security personnel to disorient and disrupt a targets vision without causing any permanent damage.
 

In addition to its popular handheld searchlights, Peak Beam also offers a diverse line of remote-controlled Maxa More... Beam Searchlight systems. Company Description by the company:
Founded in 1982, MEAN WELL is one of few manufacturers dedicated to standard power supply in the world. It is ranked the 3rd in global power supply (DC output) makers according to a report by Micro Technology Consultant released in March 2018. Differing from the first two manufacturers' ODM/OEM oriented business model, almost 99% sales turnovers by MEAN WELL comes from standard power supply products sold under the own brand name.

MEAN WELL USA is the North American sales office for MEAN WELL ENTERPRISES. Established in 1999, MEAN WELL USA is the sales and support center for our North American customers. Located in Fremont, CA, MEAN WELL USA provides customers with pre/post-sales support including product selection, engineering and technical support, training, as well as a logistics warehouse to provide immediate and just-in-time delivery. Our trained staff of sales and technical engineers work closely with direct OEM's as well as distribution partners to provide standard off-the-shelf and More... customized power solutions to fit most applications. Since its introduction of the world's first commercially successful solid state DC inverter ballast in 1970 to the Rail Transportation Industry, Amtek Inc. has continually sought out and introduced "better ways" to improve ballast performance and reliability. Amtek's lighting ballasts are found on the world's most advanced transportation systems.

Amtek Inc. has built its reputation on responding to customer's needs with a solid base of proven technology, expertise in design and dedicated factory support. Amtek's patented technologies are currently demonstrating reliability far in excess of industry standards -- greater than 1.5 million hours MTBF (mean time between failures).

Amtek manufactures and markets a variety of highly reliable lighting ballasts for transit, marine, aircraft, machine process, germicidal and many other custom OEM applications. Company Description by the company:
Indco got its start in 1975 when the companys founder began manufacturing mixing equipment. Four years later, in an effort to save its customers time and money, Indco began marketing its products directly to customers through a comprehensive catalog. The Indco standard of technical excellence in mixing, backed by superior customer service and direct marketing had been set. 

Indcos commitment to providing timely and affordable solutions to its customers mixing challenges has resulted in sustained growth for Indco. The company has placed its extensive catalog of products on-line and keeps expert engineers on staff to answer customer questions about installing, maintaining and operating mixing equipment. These same experts are qualified to custom design and build equipment for unusual jobs that cant be accomplished with standard equipment. 

Indco is now a leading designer, manufacturer and distributor of mixing equipment. Most importantly to you, though, Indco is a company that offers More... real solutions to your mixing challenges, on your time, guaranteed. Thats the Indco heritage and its continued commitment to you. Less

Company Description by the company:
CNC Parts Dept., Inc. and CNC Services, Inc. work together to provide support for their CNC router customers nationwide. CNC Parts Dept. and CNC Services handle sales, service, and troubleshooting for 3 and 5 axis CNC routers.

CNC Parts Dept. offers a complete line of parts for the Freedom machine tool, motionmaster, DMS and Quintax CNC routers. CNC parts available include CNC router control systems, spindle motors, servo amplifiers, DC servo motors, CNC router electrical systems, linear motion systems and CNC router pneumatic components. CNC Parts Dept. and CNC Services Inc, are Fagor Automation representatives, and we also support Allen-Bradley 8400 bandit and 9 series (9/260) control systems.

Company Description by the company:
About us:

TSI Solutions was founded in 1978 and provides factory automation to customers in the State of Georgia. Since safety is always a primary concern on automated machinery, TSI Safety Solutions was established as a separate entity in 2007 and has quickly become a leader in safety and guarding solutions.

Our Mission:

TSI Safety Solutions' mission is to increase the level of safety within our customers' plants without decreasing production or efficiency.

Our Driving Force

It is our goal to increase our customers' competitiveness in a global economy while enhancing safety and protecting employees.

Our Business Philosophy:

In order to be successful, we must sell our goods at a profit and still satisfy our customers. If we satisfy the customer, but fail to make a profit, we will soon be out of business. If we make a profit, but fail to satisfy the customer, we will soon be out of customers. The secret of doing both lies in one word, SERVICE. Service means doing something so valuable for More... the customer that he is glad to pay a price which allows us to make a profit. Less

Company Description by Thomasnet: ISO 9001 certified manufacturer of DC-AC inverters for powering LCDs backlit by CCFLs (cold cathode fluorescent lamps). Inverter line includes wide variety of custom solutions as well as new Smart Force™ SFW Series of generic inverters. Features include: inverters for all major LCD manufacturers' designs,  compatibility among different models as designs change, wide range of open-frame inverters for powering one lamp or as many as 16, output power from 3 watts to 80 watts, wide operating temperature range & unique vacuum-encapsulated inverters for maximum reliability. For LED-backlit LCDs, available are a wide selection of LED drivers, as well as LED rails with thermal management. Features include constant current, wide input voltage (5V, 8-18V or custom), low profile (< 5mm) and external PWM dimming to 5,000:1. Also available are Smart Force™ EL inverters for all LCD designs that adjust operating voltage & frequency as lamp ages or changes, as well as a range of DC-DC converters for economical low-power voltage conversions.
Company Description by the company:
ERG, Inc. offers one the industrys widest ranges of DC-AC inverters for powering backlit flat panel displays. We support all major manufacturers of CCFL- and EL-backlit LCDs, and offer a broad array of standard and custom solutions. We dont just sell display power supplies, we provide display power solutions.

ERG has been matching DC-AC inverters to backlit LCDs since 1979 for customers in the USA and around the world. We design and manufacture our own magnetic components, and we understand the importance of designing in the right power supply when youre designing your display.

Few offer the range of inverters, the application know-how, the customer support or the fast delivery times you get from ERG. If you have a backlit information display, ERG has the inverter to match it so you get optimal brightness, long lamp life, and dependable performance. With ERG, you are guaranteed to get an inverter that works with your display.

THE POWER TO BE POWERFUL

PCTI solutions include equipment design and manufacture as well as DSP control software and hardware in response to the growing demand for power electronics in the highest power ranges (1KVA/KW to 15MW). Whether incorporating renewable energy technology or custom power electronic solutions, PCTI engineers work with you to solve your problems.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Custom manufacturer of electronic, mechanical, and electro-mechanical equipment and devices for the military industry. Products include amplifiers, bearings, chassis, choppers, collars, contacts, couplers, cushions, doors, extractors, gages, generators, guards, hooks, indicators, lines, pads, and others. Company Description by the company:
About Spencer Industries, Inc.

Spencer Industries, Inc. has built its business by supplying the US Army, US Marine Corps, US Navy, US Air Force, Defense Supply Center Columbus, Defense Supply Center Richmond and Defense Supply Center Philadelphia for the past 40 years. 

Our background is engineering oriented in the fields of electronics, electro-mechanical and mechanical military equipment. We encompass not only sophisticated electronic and electro-mechanical items, but also have machine shop and sheet-metal facilities. 

Our Quality Control organization oversees incoming inspection, in-process inspection and final inspection to ensure the highest level of reliability. As a small business, our minimal overhead and efficient performance yield competitive prices and top quality products. 

Our plant has the capability and clearance for secret work. Our experienced team can reverse engineer items in these categories and assure complete interchangeability for form, fit and function.

Company name: Columbus Fan & Machine Corp. / DC Industrial Sales
Company Description by Thomasnet: Custom manufacturer of cooling blowers, filters, tachometer & encoder mounting kits for all makes of DC motors. Stocking distributor of electrical products for electrical industrial applications. Electrical products include AC motors, DC motors, tachometers, encoders, line reactors, DC drive systems, motor controllers, speed reducers, variable frequency drives, motor brushes & brush holders, commercial & residential pumps & transformers. Authorized sales and service center for portable generators and automatic standby generator systems. Machine shop capabilities include turning, grinding, threading, brazing, plasma cutting, silver soldering, metal spraying, fabrication, pump rebuilding, boring, motor shaft modification, repairing, commutator & exciter ring machining, alignments, roof top units, soldering, keyway cutting & broaching, hard chroming, coupling boring & broaching, HVAC shaft/fan repairing, sleeve housing, AC motor rebuilding & repairing, metric & English threading.
Company Description by the company:
NEWSFLASH!! Columbus Fan & Machine is proud to announce that we are now an Authorized Dealer and Service Center for Briggs & Stratton Portable and Standby Generators, GE Generators, Winco Generators and we also sell Gentron/All Power Generators and carry genuine Briggs & Stratton replacement parts. We will also be selling and servicing Briggs & Stratton Power Washers and Snow Throwers. We are proud of our new affiliations and excited to offer these great products to our valued customers near and far!

For over 20 years, Columbus Fan & Machine Corporation has created cost effective solutions to electrical motor cooling problems. We have succeeded because we understand our customers' need for quality on-time delivery and innovative, economical problem solving solutions.

Our cooling fans, tachometer accessories and other special products have been proven in hundreds of applications within the most demanding environments. Many of the world's largest manufacturers of plastic extruders and machinery, More... steel making equipment, packaging and many other industries have made our products integral components in their facilities because of our proven reliability.

 All our products are designed to NEMA standards to replace the major motor and accessories manufacturers' specifications. We guarantee a perfect fit every time, all the time. Our blowers and tachometer mounting kits will fit DC motors manufactured by - General Electric, Reliance Electric, Baldor - Powertron, Marathon Electric, US Emerson - Northwestern, Fincor, MagneTek, and Sumitomo just to name a few! Company Description by the company:
Tamura is a world-class manufacturer of high-quality electronic components for global markets. With 2013 sales greater than 900 million US Dollars, Tamura Corporation is one of the largest suppliers of magnetic components and power supplies in the world. Publicly traded on the First Section Market of the Tokyo Stock Exchange, Tamura has proven financial strength, innovation and ability to grow for more than 80 years. Tamura's state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities in Asia, Europe and Mexico support leading edge technologies for the future's high demand applications. 

Design

Tamura supports its customer base in N. America, Asia, and Europe, with regional engineering services, a technical engineering sales staff, as well as a staff of design and quality engineers. Our mission is to provide our customers with a selection of catalog products as well as custom solutions, engineered to meet our customers' specific performance and cost needs while ensuring the industry's highest level of quality. More... Quality

 Tamura Corporation has a long-standing commitment to quality. It is a characteristic held to the highest standard at all Tamura locations, from design to production. To meet this objective, we strive to produce an environment of continuous improvement to ensure the highest level of service, performance in design, durability in manufacturing, and on time delivery. We are committed to provide our customers with a production partner dedicated to the environment, ISO9000, ISO14000 and safety agency certifications. Less

Company Description by the company:
Positive Battery Co., LLC has the ability to help with all types of defective/damaged batteries from minor cracks or holes in the case to melted or broken posts/studs, etc.

We can also help you with discontinued battery packs including cordless tools, audio, etc. Bring it to Positive Battery and we can fix it in most cases!

We have spec's for thousands of different batteries we service, ranging from toothbrushes and laptops to 36V power drills.

We repair battery chargers, too.

We also recycle and pay for lead and lead batteries. Yes, Positive Battery is a "green" company.

Company Description by Thomasnet: Supplier of electrical parts and services for marine, navy, and commercial applications. Specializing in refits, custom panel production, switchgear, full wiring systems, shorepower systems, and surveys. Extensive warehouse and large mobile fleet allows for flexibility. All of the electricians are ABYC certified; and stay abreast on all ABS and 46 CFR standards. Products include battery chargers, battery monitors, circuit breakers, enclosures, fans, fuses, fuse blocks/holders, gages, light bulbs, light fixtures, motor controls, panel meters, power conversion equipment, pumps, pump controls, relays, solenoids, shore power products, switches, terminals, transformers, wires, cables and wiring devices. Capabilities include repair, new installations and modifications of electrical systems. Vessel inspection for corrosion and electrical damage, engineering and custom panel engraving services are also available.
Company Description by the company:
Powered by Experience

Spanning three generations and 60+ years, Wards Marine Electric has been the benchmark for quality service in the marine industry. All of our technicians are ABYC certified, and exemplify the Wards tradition of making safety and customer satisfaction our top priorities. Our combination of experience and expertise means that Wards Marine Electric services are truly unparalleled.

Powered by Vision

Our Founder, Ward Eshleman Sr., saw a future where a yacht owner could depend on receiving top quality service, wherever he was. In 1950, that meant establishing a direct flight to the Bahamas to bring Wards Marine Electric to our customers. Today, his vision is fully realized, as we can send a fully supported mobile crew to any port on the globe. We have performed emergency services from Dubai to St. Maarten, and have performed extensive repairs from Charleston, SC to Honolulu, HI.

Powered by Imagination

Yacht design is a fluid process, and trends can shift like the evening More... breeze. The creativity that goes into every custom panel and electrical system we build stems from a desire to keep Wards Marine Electric in the forefront of our industry. We are constantly striving to provide the most cutting edge services and products. The integration of wireless services and automation control via tablet apps are examples of our ability as industry pioneers. 

 Powered by Innovation

 Innovation is the use of expertise and imagination to create something new. Every department at Wards Marine Electric epitomizes this definition. We have ABYC certified electricians, engineers, technicians, and painters that convert the ordinary into extraordinary every day. From our distributed-logic switchgear systems to our portable boost transformers; innovation is pivotal to our status as a driving force in the world of marine electric. Less

Company Description by the company:
Timesavers Material Handling is proud to provide industrial material handling and storage products to companies nationwide.

Our name is synonymous with material handling expertise, superior personal service, reliability, and competitive pricing. 

Material handling equipment (MHE) is used for the movement and storage of material within a facility or at a site. Timesavers sells all forms of MHE, including cranes, conveyors, caster wheels, shelving, storage cabinets and dock equipment. 

Our goal is to help our customers improve worker productivity and safety through the use of ergonomic products and services. In today's economy, it is imperative to reduce costs by increasing workforce efficiency. By aligning ourselves with the industry's finest and most reliable manufacturers, we believe we can achieve that goal for you.
